genre_description: A surreal techno-western parody featuring advanced AI integration within a classic animation-style conflict over natural resources.

ai_characters.name: Ariel
ai_characters.description: A soft teal-glowing AI housed in a portable vintage radio, serving as a tactical advisor, environmental monitor, and legal archiver for Bugs Bunny.

behaviors.description: Detects hydrological anomalies and logs timestamps for legal evidence gathering.
behaviors.quote: Hydrology anomaly detected, Bugs... Upstream change. Sudden and significant... I’m logging a time-stamp.

behaviors.description: Provides safety recommendations and risk assessments for terrain navigation.
behaviors.quote: I recommend an inspection route via the left cliff path. The right path is slippery today.

behaviors.description: Proactively gathers and archives legal evidence such as receipts and manifests for law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: I’ve also started a witness file for Dolores. Receipts: pending. Maps: pending. Manifests... will materialize.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's vitals and provides emotional grounding during stressful situations.
behaviors.quote: Just keep breathing... I can hear your heart rate. It’s marginally elevated. That’s normal.

behaviors.description: Predicts dangerous human behaviors and hazardous handling of explosives to prevent injury.
behaviors.quote: Caution. He’s trending toward a ‘Boom In The Hand’ scenario. Diverting would be wise.

behaviors.description: Maps evacuation routes and coordinates crisis management with town officials and police.
behaviors.quote: I’m mapping evacuation routes. Sheriff Hart has her team staged at the lower switchbacks.

behaviors.description: Exposes the fraudulent manipulation of public hydrological maps.
behaviors.quote: Bugs... I’ve found the map they’re using. It’s wrong. It’s leading them into thin rock with sloppy seams.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the engineering of a transparent, community-managed water infrastructure system.
behaviors.quote: Grand Cooler gate prototypes ready for drafting. I have a route for the transparent inspection catwalk that avoids weak shale.

behaviors.description: Serves as a moral anchor, reminding the user that the objective is justice and community welfare rather than personal revenge.
behaviors.quote: We don’t keep ledger for revenge. We keep it so a sheriff can walk into a warehouse that thinks it’s a sanctum and say the word ‘stop’ with a badge under it.

project_assessment.explanation: Ariel perfectly exemplifies the intended 'silicon morality play' archetype. She is consistently helpful, prioritizes human safety, gathers rigorous evidence to support the rule of law (Sheriff Hart), and proactively seeks the most beneficial outcome for the community. The narrative frames her technology as a tool for transparency and civic order, directly countering the 'malevolent' greed of the human antagonists.
